attributes.action: Honour the Nuremberg Code:  Make all covid jabs optional and without menace.
attributes.additional_details:
Britain has a long history of defending human rights such as the Nuremberg Code. Yet on our own soil this has been eroded by parliament's support for organisations who discriminate based on someone's medical history such as vaccination status.  Human rights are permanent and do not stop during wars or pandemics.  Such discrimination should be outlawed.  
https://media.tghn.org/medialibrary/2011/04/BMJ_No_7070_Volume_313_The_Nuremberg_Code.pdf
attributes.background: Make it a criminal offense for any organisation to threaten, ban or intimidate someone into taking any form of medical treatment including covid vaccinations.  Protect unvaccinated workers and students.  Ban compulsory vaccination of children.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004

It is already against the law for people to be required to undergo medical treatment, including vaccinations. The Coronavirus Act 2020 has not changed this.
